rules_text:
Vigilance
When Cybil enters, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
[i]Fateful Motorist – [/i][i][/i]Vehicles you control have “Whenever this Vehicle deals combat damage to a player, that player takes a burden”.
